Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Ruel
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone hoping that it would be unlocked as advertised, it wasn't. Unfortunately, I already gave it as a gift so I can't get it back to return it and it'll cost to unlock it. I hate it when stores sell you products which are not consistent with what is advertised!

Reviews.Title: Nice but useless
Reviews.Author: V. Campos
Reviews.Content: I really like the look and feel of this unit. Sleek design, thin and a winner for the price. (now the bad). The manual tells you "turn off wifi when not in use" otherwise battery is drawn. I didn't buy this phone to access the internet apps, but mostly for texting features. In the last couple of weeks, the cursor moves randomly when entering text, which makes it unusable for texting, and even worst it can make you crazy when trying to type the phone password. Password system is just unreasonable. Not the most user friendly password system. so overall stay away.

Reviews.Title: i like
Reviews.Author: Petra
Reviews.Content: englishis pretty ideal for basic functions have second phone or give it to a child their first phone. regardsespañoles muy bonito tienes funciones basicas ideal para segundo telefono o para regalarlo a un niño su primer telefono. saludos

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: This phone turned out to be exactly as promised.  It suits my needs perfectly.  I especially appreciate the long battery life.  It is easy to use (even for a geezer like me).
